user_story.i_want: view the agenda and minutes of past and future meetings
user_story.so_that: keep track of meetings of the co-op

givens_list: there is an upcoming General Meeting
whens_list: I go to the Meetings page
I follow "View agenda and details" for the upcoming meeting
thens_list: I should see the agenda for the upcoming meeting

givens_list: there has been a General Meeting in the past
minutes have been entered for the meeting
whens_list: I go to the Meetings page
I follow "View minutes" for the past meeting
thens_list: I should see the minutes for the past meeting
